glsa.title: memcached: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in memcached which could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: memcached is a high-performance, distributed memory object caching system

description.p: Multiple integer overflow vulnerabilities were discovered in memcached. Please review the CVE identifiers and Cisco TALOS reports referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could abuse memcachedâ€™s binary protocol leading to the remote execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
